definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: THESEUS A very gentle beast, and of a good conscience.
sentences.chinese: 一头非常善良的畜生，有一颗好良心。

sentences.english: If there is next life, darling, I may be only for the humble round of the beast.
sentences.chinese: 假如有来生，亲爱的，我也许只能轮为卑微的畜生。

sentences.english: Ninth, You shall not bliss brainlesses, psychos and animals wearing human skin roll.
sentences.chinese: 第九条，不可祝福脑残，精神病以及畜生。

sentences.english: Dang it, another major set-back for Egypts space program.
sentences.chinese: 畜生，又是埃及航空计划的一大挫败啊。

sentences.english: The unsophisticated brute preferred to let his weapon do the talking.
sentences.chinese: 这个不谙世事的畜生更喜欢用武器说话。

sentences.english: The brute leapt into the air, flinging itself onto the machine.
sentences.chinese: 这畜生一跃而起，扑到了机器上。

sentences.english: He decided to drown the animal.
“You’ve behaved like a complete shit, ” his mother-in-law said.
sentences.chinese: “你的行为简直像畜生，”他岳母说。

sentences.english: Wherefore are we counted as beasts, and reputed vile in your sight?
sentences.chinese: 我们为何算为畜生，在你眼中看作污秽呢。

sentences.english: I can’t survive without this animal.
sentences.chinese: 没有这畜生我活不下去。

sentences.english: I do think men are cunning brutes .
sentences.chinese: 我真觉得人是顶狡狯的畜生。

sentences.english: No human beings live here in Jungle Republic. We are all animals.
sentences.chinese: 没有人类在丛林共和国中生活的，我们都是畜生。

sentences.english: The beast was savage and half-starved.
sentences.chinese: 那畜生很凶猛，而且只喂得半饱。

sentences.english: Don't even try, you little runt.
Twenty score men and seven thousand beasts.
sentences.chinese: 二十位信赖真相的人类与七千只畜生。

sentences.english: A thorn in the eye of the beast to the end.
sentences.chinese: 一直都是畜生的眼中钉。

definition: worse than a dog or pig/lower than low
